channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 破产的加密货币公司 3AC 和 FTX 从 Sam Altman 的 Worldcoin 140% 的涨幅中得到一些安慰
item.description: Bankrupt crypto firms 3AC and FTX are getting some relief from a 140% rally in Sam Altman's Worldcoin trib.al/stvxxwk

item.title: 埃克森公司承诺不会削减在圭亚那的勘探或生产计划，因为委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗继续加强其在该地区的领土主张
item.description: Exxon pledged not to curtail exploration or production plans in Guyana as Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro continues to ramp up his territorial claims in the region trib.al/BGgamYZ

item.title: 希腊总理表示没有财政空间提供进一步的财政减免，但希腊农民仍驾驶拖拉机前往雅典，抗议活动不断升级
item.description: Greek farmers are escalating their protests by driving their tractors to Athens, even after the prime minister says there’s no fiscal space to offer further financial relief trib.al/qjJZRum

item.title: 消息人士称，中东和中国的主权财富基金正在洽谈联合投资麦当劳中国业务的事宜
item.description: Middle Eastern and Chinese sovereign wealth funds are in talks to jointly invest in McDonald’s China business, sources say trib.al/fnG7hon

item.title: "汽车界的空中客车 "正在酝酿之中，以帮助欧洲汽车制造商与中国竞争，抵御生存威胁
item.description: An "Airbus of autos" is being floated to help Europe’s carmakers compete with China and fend off existential threats trib.al/2vRBDTU

item.title: 加拿大的消费价格在今年年初有所回落，基本压力方面的进展可能会为加拿大央行在未来几个月开始考虑降息提供更多空间
item.description: Canada’s consumer prices eased at the start of this year, with progress on underlying pressures likely to give the Bank of Canada more room to start considering rate cuts in the coming months trib.al/9igSkqi

item.title: 乌克兰表示，由于与波兰在农产品运输问题上的争执阻断了与欧盟的陆地边界，乌克兰正计划增加一条途经多瑙河的路线，以将出口量提高到战前水平
item.description: Ukraine said it’s planning an additional route via the Danube River to boost exports to pre-war levels as a spat with Poland over agricultural deliveries blocks a land border with the European Union trib.al/dBHMHcE

item.title: 俄罗斯能源部的数据显示，俄罗斯 1 月份实现了削减原油出口的目标，履行了对欧佩克+盟国的承诺
item.description: Russia met its target for crude-export cuts in January, complying with its pledge to allies in OPEC+, according to data from the country’s Energy Ministry trib.al/wCcQiGT

item.title: 欧洲议会议员也难逃养老金通胀问题
item.description: Even MEPs Can’t Escape Pension Inflation Problem trib.al/yQ5CK3e

item.title: 南非正考虑动用应急储备基金帮助弥补预算赤字
item.description: South Africa is considering using its contingency reserve fund to help fund its budget deficit trib.al/AhRDssy

item.title: Rivian 早就失去了成为特斯拉最可信竞争对手的资格。现在，它能否驾驭电动汽车需求的放缓，是对其最大的考验
item.description: Rivian lost its claim to be Tesla’s most credible competitor long ago. Now, its ability to navigate an EV demand slowdown poses its biggest test trib.al/gtdYcvf

item.title: Capital One 收购 Discover Financial 的交易将使两家最大的信用卡公司合并在一起。以下是您需要了解的所有信息
item.description: Capital One's deal to buy Discover Financial will bring together two of the biggest credit card firms. Here's all you need to know trib.al/zifC1O4

item.title:
"显然，我们并不需要通胀率回到目标值后才降息"
行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）向国会议员介绍英格兰银行在降息前希望看到的结果
item.description:
"We don't need, obviously, inflation to come back to target before we cut interest rates"

Governor Andrew Bailey tells MPs what the Bank of England wants to see before rates come down trib.al/V5aPIHj

item.title: 计划建造世界最高住宅楼的阿联酋开发商正寻求首次在债券市场融资
item.description: The UAE developer planning the world’s tallest residential tower is looking to raise money in the bond market for the first time trib.al/Sc9tq8z

item.title: 中国两大证券交易所将一家大型量化对冲基金的账户冻结三天，因为该基金经理在周一一分钟内抛售了 3.6 亿美元的股票
item.description: China’s two main stock exchanges froze the accounts of a major quant hedge fund for three days after the money manager dumped $360 million in shares within a minute on Monday trib.al/B8NIDvL

item.title: 收听彭博英国政治的最新消息
item.description: Listen for the latest from Bloomberg UK Politics trib.al/zlppp58

item.title: @mburtonmetals 写道："政府为加强关键矿产库存所做的努力可能会帮助生产商为矿山和炼油厂筹集到至关重要的资金。
item.description: Government efforts to shore up inventories of critical minerals may help producers raise crucial financing for mines and refineries, writes @mburtonmetals trib.al/UhMvDTf

item.title: 里希-苏纳克告诉英国农民，他 "与他们站在一起"，因为英国首相正努力在大选前赢回农村地区的支持。
item.description: Rishi Sunak told British farmers he is “by their side” as the UK prime minister tries to win back rural support ahead of a general election trib.al/aNMyZaY

item.title: 彭博社公布了年度最高薪对冲基金经理名单。伊兹-英格兰德、肯-格里芬和比尔-阿克曼名列最富有的 15 位对冲基金经理之列。
item.description: Bloomberg's annual list of the best-paid hedge fund managers is here. Among the 15 richest are Izzy Englander, Ken Griffin, and Bill Ackman trib.al/jzXreJu

item.title: 壳牌支持的乙醇公司考虑在巴西生产可持续航空燃料
item.description: Shell-Backed Ethanol Firm Considers Making Sustainable Jet Fuel in Brazil trib.al/gYoYQO4

item.title: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，在决策者支持降息之前，通胀率无需降至 2% 的目标水平
item.description: Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey says inflation does not need to fall to its 2% target before policymakers back an interest-rate cut trib.al/lhTf6OG

item.title:
RT by @markets："在我看来，外国投资者在市场中的代表性仍未达到我们预期的水平"。
沙特 Tadawul 首席执行官哈立德-胡桑（Khalid Al-Hussan）说，外国投资者错过了击败大多数新兴市场同行的回报。
item.description:
“The representation of foreign investors in the market is still, in my opinion, not at the level we would anticipate.”

Saudi Tadawul CEO Khalid Al-Hussan says foreigners are missing out on returns that have beaten most emerging-market peers trib.al/a81oSlQ

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: Five Things You Need to Know to Start Your Day: Americas trib.al/KuJm6im

item.title: 华尔街的经济学家们希望科维德事件后的生产力繁荣能够持续下去，这将在通胀不回升的情况下维持强劲的经济增长。美联储官员对这一想法很感兴趣，但有点怀疑
item.description: Wall Street economists are looking for the post-Covid boom in productivity to continue, which would sustain strong growth without a pickup in inflation. Federal Reserve officials are intrigued by the idea, but a little bit skeptical trib.al/GzRk6eD

item.title: 市场开始猜测美联储的下一步行动是向上而非向下
item.description: Markets are starting to speculate if the Fed's next move is up, not down trib.al/8V0XJbW

item.title: 对于各类企业而言，私人信贷正成为主流贷款的有力竞争者。然而，当下一次大的经济衰退来临时，这个不透明的金融角落将如何应对还不清楚。
item.description: Private credit is becoming a serious rival to mainstream lending for all kinds of businesses. Yet it’s not clear how this opaque corner of finance will cope when the next big recession hits trib.al/GPFDu1q

item.title: @JLeeEnergy 写道：俄罗斯的原油海运面临风险，印度炼油商仍在回避一个关键的出口等级。除非腾出专门的穿梭油轮来装载新货，否则出口将会减少。
item.description: Russia's seaborne crude flows are at risk, with Indian refiners still shunning a key export grade, writes @JLeeEnergy. Exports will be curtailed unless specialized shuttle tankers are freed up to load fresh cargoes. trib.al/vTp1GrL

item.title: 与海外平台相比，比特币在美国加密货币交易所的交易变得更加容易，这种流动性的变化归因于新的数字资产交易所交易基金的影响。
item.description: Bitcoin has become easier to trade on US crypto exchanges compared with platforms overseas, a shift in liquidity attributed to the impact of new exchange-traded funds for the digital asset trib.al/bZ1S3SZ

item.title: 巴西正在与登革热展开一场艰难的战争。
item.description: Brazil is waging a difficult war against dengue fever. trib.al/4cNcmq3

item.title: RT by @markets：欢迎参加 3 月 7 日在吉达举行的彭博社 #PowerPlayers 会议。我们与 SRMG 和 @AsharqBusiness 合作，为您带来与全球最具影响力的体育界人士进行的新闻对话。直播时间为格林尼治标准时间上午 11:00 +3！
item.description: Join us in Jeddah March 7th for Bloomberg #PowerPlayers. We’ve partnered with SRMG & @AsharqBusiness to bring you news making conversations with some of the world’s most influential voices in sports. Live at 11:00 AM GMT +3! bloom.bg/4bB57jp
